: : Darkangel : :

Darkangel: So I'm to ask them to supply and combine their ships weapons to this battery in a combined effort? Both sides will be reluctant, but I shall try.

Angel waits to see if his commander has any more to say before he follows his standing orders.


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
Tyrael: My plan is to build a giant artillery battery in order to 
greet our moon-sized friend... Contact the Predacons, then the 
Maximals. Do not talk about Unicron. If they ask for motives... make 
up an excuse.
